name: Trapped in the Gym
description:
Controls: WASD to move, click to shoot. 1 or 2 to swap between weapons if you pick up multiple.

Created by zrnorth and stevenla for the Global Game Jam 2021.  The theme was "Lost and Found." Originally we had an idea where you would combine a bunch of different items in a lost and found box to fight off zombies, but we gradually scaled down our ambitions over the course of the jam ;)

This game was an opportunity for us to learn to Blender for modelling and animation, and we modelled everything in the game ourselves. Personally I (zrnorth) had never touched Blender before this jam and I learned an absolutely huge amount over the course of the weekend. I'm particularly proud of the zombies' walk cycle and how they stick their hands out to throttle the player when they see you. 

I like to compose original music for jam games but we ran out of time. I didn't make the BGM this time, it came from a free site.

Enjoy the game, and try not to get too scared ;)
